Name: Evolve Charm
LongDescription: Earns the Pok√©mon bonus Exp. Points. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Eevee and all evolutions.  Swap an Eevee Tail and an Eevee Card for an Evolve Charm at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
